property.name: dfs.replication
property.description: Default block replication. The actual number of replications can be specified when the file is created.

property.name: dfs.namenode.name.dir
property.description: Directory where DFS NameNode stores fsimage. Can be a comma-delimited list for redundancy.

property.name: dfs.datanode.data.dir
property.description: Directory where DFS DataNode stores blocks. Can be a comma-delimited list on different devices.
